[User Question]
Give me closing balances for Jan and June 2003 along with the growth percentage for vision operations ledger showing the list of accounts that have grown by more than 5% between the above months. Include only expense accounts

WITH closing_balances AS (
    SELECT
        gcc.segment3                                                                                                             AS account
        ,
        SUM(nvl(bal.begin_balance_dr, 0) - nvl(bal.begin_balance_cr, 0) + nvl(bal.period_net_dr, 0) - nvl(bal.period_net_cr, 0)) AS closing_balance
    FROM
             gl_balances bal
        JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id
        JOIN gl_ledgers           led ON bal.ledger_id = led.ledger_id
        JOIN gl_periods           gp ON bal.period_name = gp.period_name
                              AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name
                              AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type
    WHERE
            led.name = 'Vision Operations (USA)'
        AND gp.start_date IN ( (
            SELECT
                start_date
            FROM
                gl_periods
            WHERE
                    period_name = 'Jan-03'
                AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name
                AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type
        ), (
            SELECT
                start_date
            FROM
                gl_periods
            WHERE
                    period_name = 'Jun-03'
                AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name
                AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type
        ) )
        AND gcc.account_type = 'E'
        AND bal.actual_flag = 'A'
        AND bal.template_id IS NULL
        AND bal.translated_flag IS NULL
        AND bal.currency_code = led.currency_code
    GROUP BY
        gcc.segment3
), growth_data AS (
    SELECT
        account, closing_balance,
        ( closing_balance - LAG(closing_balance)
                            OVER(PARTITION BY account
                                 ORDER BY
                                     account
        ) ) / nullif(
            abs(LAG(closing_balance)
                OVER(PARTITION BY account
                     ORDER BY
                         account
            )),
            0
        ) * 100 AS growth_percentage
    FROM
        closing_balances
)
SELECT
    account,
    closing_balance,
    growth_percentage
FROM
    growth_data
WHERE
    growth_percentage > 5
ORDER BY
    account;

Total Non-Recoverable Tax for a Given Month NONREC_TAX lines represent tax paid but not reclaimable (expense)

[User Question]
give me list of suppllier invoices that are  paid before the due date

SELECT ai.invoice_id, ai.invoice_num, ai.invoice_date, ass.due_date, ass.amount_remaining, ai.vendor_id, aps.vendor_name, ai.creation_date AS invoice_creation_date, ai.last_update_date AS invoice_last_update_date, ass.payment_num, aip.creation_date AS payment_date, ass.due_date -  aip.creation_date  AS ADVANCED_days FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all ass ON ai.invoice_id = ass.invoice_id JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ass.invoice_id = aip.invoice_id AND ass.payment_num = aip.payment_num JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.check_id = aca.check_id WHERE ai.cancelled_date IS NULL and ai.invoice_amount > 0 AND   ass.due_date -  aip.creation_date >0 ORDER BY ass.payment_num, ai.invoice_id, aip.payment_num

[User Question]
Find POs and suppliers where shipments have more than 2 unique waybill numbers.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, COUNT(DISTINCT rsh.waybill_airbill_num) AS waybill_count FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON pha.po_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT rsh.waybill_airbill_num) > 2

[User Question]
Find PO lines with the highest unit price per supplier using ROW_NUMBER and 6 tables.*/

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, pla.po_line_id, pla.unit_price, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY aps.vendor_name ORDER BY pla.unit_price DESC) AS rn FROM po_lines_all pla JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN po_distributions_all pod ON pla.po_line_id = pod.po_line_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND pod.destination_organization_id = msi.organization_id ) WHERE rn = 1

[User Question]
give me the list of invoices, where time taken to final approve invoice is more than  x days say 10 days

WITH approval_data AS ( SELECT ai.invoice_id, ai.invoice_num, ai.invoice_date, aps.vendor_name, ah.iteration, ah.response, ah.creation_date AS response_date, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ah.invoice_id, ah.iteration ORDER BY ah.approval_history_id) AS rn_first, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ah.invoice_id, ah.iteration ORDER BY ah.approval_history_id DESC) AS rn_last FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id JOIN ap_inv_aprvl_hist_all ah ON ai.invoice_id = ah.invoice_id WHERE 1=1 ), submission_dates AS ( SELECT invoice_id, iteration, MIN(response_date) AS submitted_date FROM approval_data WHERE response NOT IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') GROUP BY invoice_id, iteration ), approval_dates AS ( SELECT invoice_id, iteration, MAX(response_date) AS approved_date FROM approval_data WHERE response IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') GROUP BY invoice_id, iteration ), latest_iterations AS ( SELECT invoice_id, MAX(iteration) AS latest_iteration FROM approval_data GROUP BY invoice_id ), final_data AS ( SELECT s.invoice_id, ai.invoice_num, ai.invoice_date, aps.vendor_name, s.iteration, s.submitted_date, a.approved_date, CASE WHEN a.approved_date IS NOT NULL THEN a.approved_date - s.submitted_date ELSE CURRENT_DATE - s.submitted_date END AS days_taken, CASE WHEN a.approved_date IS NOT NULL THEN 'Approved' ELSE 'Pending or Withdrawn' END AS approval_status, l.latest_iteration FROM submission_dates s LEFT JOIN approval_dates a ON s.invoice_id = a.invoice_id AND s.iteration = a.iteration JOIN latest_iterations l ON s.invoice_id = l.invoice_id JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id ) SELECT invoice_num, invoice_date, vendor_name, iteration, invoice_id, submitted_date, approved_date, days_taken, approval_status FROM final_data WHERE ( approved_date IS NOT NULL AND days_taken > 0 ) OR ( approved_date IS NULL AND iteration = latest_iteration AND days_taken > 10 ) ORDER BY submitted_date DESC

[User Question]
Provide backdated vendor balance by currency as of 31-Dec-2007 for vision operations */

WITH param AS (
    /* Define cutoff date centrally */
    SELECT 
        TO_DATE('2007-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cutoff_date
    FROM dual
),  payments_after_cutoff AS (
    /* Payments made after the cutoff date (no operating unit restriction) */
    SELECT
        aip.INVOICE_ID,
        SUM(NVL(aip.AMOUNT, 0)) AS payment_after_cutoff
    FROM
        ap_invoice_payments_all aip
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
    WHERE
        aip.ACCOUNTING_DATE > p.cutoff_date
    GROUP BY
        aip.INVOICE_ID
),  prepay_after_cutoff AS (
    /* Prepayments (adjustments) made after the cutoff date (no operating unit restriction) */
    SELECT
        aid.INVOICE_ID,
        SUM(NVL(aid.AMOUNT, 0)) AS prepay_after_cutoff
    FROM
        ap_invoice_distributions_all aid
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
    WHERE
        aid.LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'PREPAY'
        AND aid.ACCOUNTING_DATE > p.cutoff_date
    GROUP BY
        aid.INVOICE_ID
),  invoice_balances AS (
    /* Sum gross amounts from all payment schedules per invoice (no operating unit restriction) */
    SELECT
        ai.INVOICE_ID,
        ai.VENDOR_ID,
        SUM(aps.GROSS_AMOUNT) AS GROSS_AMOUNT
    FROM
        ap_invoices_all ai
        JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
    GROUP BY
        ai.INVOICE_ID,
        ai.VENDOR_ID
)  SELECT
    /* Final vendor-level unpaid balances as of the cutoff date */
    s.VENDOR_NAME,
    SUM(
        ib.GROSS_AMOUNT
        - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0)
        - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)
    ) AS UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF
FROM
    invoice_balances ib
    JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ib.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID
    LEFT JOIN payments_after_cutoff pac ON ib.INVOICE_ID = pac.INVOICE_ID
    LEFT JOIN prepay_after_cutoff ppc ON ib.INVOICE_ID = ppc.INVOICE_ID
GROUP BY
    s.VENDOR_NAME
HAVING
    /* Exclude vendors with no outstanding balance */
    SUM(
        ib.GROSS_AMOUNT
        - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0)
        - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)
    ) <> 0
ORDER BY
    UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF DESC

[User Question]
give me invoice wise aging as on 31-dec-2007 outsanding due dates */

WITH direct_payments AS (
    SELECT
        aip.invoice_id,
        aps.due_date,
        aps.payment_num,
        aps.gross_amount,
        SUM(NVL(aip.amount, 0)) AS paid_amount
    FROM
        ap_invoice_payments_all aip
        JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps 
            ON aip.invoice_id = aps.invoice_id
            AND aip.payment_num = aps.payment_num
    WHERE
        aip.accounting_date <= to_date('31-dec-2007','dd-mon-yyyy')
    GROUP BY
        aip.invoice_id, aps.due_date, aps.payment_num, aps.gross_amount
),
prepayment_applied AS (
    SELECT
        invoice_id,
        SUM(NVL(amount, 0)) AS prepay_amount
    FROM
        ap_invoice_distributions_all
    WHERE
        line_type_lookup_code = 'PREPAY'
        AND accounting_date <= to_date('31-dec-2007','dd-mon-yyyy')
    GROUP BY
        invoice_id
),
payment_schedule_ordered AS (
    SELECT
        aps.invoice_id,
        ai.invoice_num,
        ai.invoice_date,
        aps.payment_num,
        aps.due_date,
        aps.gross_amount,
        NVL(dp.paid_amount, 0) AS paid_amount,
        NVL(pap.prepay_amount, 0) AS prepay_amount,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY aps.invoice_id ORDER BY aps.due_date) AS rn
    FROM
        ap_payment_schedules_all aps
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aps.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id
        LEFT JOIN direct_payments dp ON aps.invoice_id = dp.invoice_id AND aps.payment_num = dp.payment_num
        LEFT JOIN prepayment_applied pap ON aps.invoice_id = pap.invoice_id
),
allocated_schedules (
    invoice_id,
    invoice_num,
    invoice_date,
    payment_num,
    due_date,
    gross_amount,
    paid_amount,
    prepay_amount,
    prepay_applied,
    remaining_amount,
    age,
    rn
) AS (
    SELECT
        invoice_id,
        invoice_num,
        invoice_date,
        payment_num,
        due_date,
        gross_amount,
        paid_amount,
        prepay_amount,
        0 AS prepay_applied,
        gross_amount - paid_amount AS remaining_amount,
        due_date - to_date('31-dec-2007','dd-mon-yyyy') AS age,
        rn
    FROM payment_schedule_ordered
    WHERE rn = 1      UNION ALL      SELECT
        ps.invoice_id,
        ps.invoice_num,
        ps.invoice_date,
        ps.payment_num,
        ps.due_date,
        ps.gross_amount,
        ps.paid_amount,
        ps.prepay_amount,
        CASE
            WHEN prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied > 0 THEN
                LEAST(ps.gross_amount - ps.paid_amount, prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied)
            ELSE
                0
        END AS prepay_applied,
        ps.gross_amount - ps.paid_amount - 
            CASE
                WHEN prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied > 0 THEN
                    LEAST(ps.gross_amount - ps.paid_amount, prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied)
                ELSE
                    0
            END AS remaining_amount,
        ps.due_date - to_date('31-dec-2007','dd-mon-yyyy') AS age,
        ps.rn
    FROM payment_schedule_ordered ps
    JOIN allocated_schedules prev 
        ON ps.invoice_id = prev.invoice_id AND ps.rn = prev.rn + 1
)
SELECT
    invoice_num,
    invoice_id,
    invoice_date,
    payment_num,
    due_date,
    gross_amount,
    paid_amount,
    prepay_applied,
    remaining_amount,
    age
FROM allocated_schedules
WHERE remaining_amount <> 0
ORDER BY invoice_num, due_date

[User Question]
Current aging summary for vendor type: VENDOR */

SELECT 
    s.VENDOR_NAME AS "VENDOR_NAME",
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE AS "VENDOR_TYPE",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE > SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "CURRENT",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 30 AND SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_1_30",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 60 AND SYSDATE - 31 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_31_60",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 90 AND SYSDATE - 61 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_61_90",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE - 90 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_90_PLUS"
FROM 
    ap_suppliers s
    JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID
    JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
    JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
WHERE 
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'VENDOR'
    AND aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING > 0
    AND AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(
            ai.INVOICE_ID,
            ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
            ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
            ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
        ) = 'APPROVED'
    AND ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'NOT REQUIRED')
    AND ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL
    AND UPPER(hr.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'
GROUP BY 
    s.VENDOR_NAME, s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE

[User Question]
list of invoices not approved even after 10 days from creation date

WITH q1 AS (
    SELECT AH.APPROVAL_HISTORY_ID, 
           AH.RESPONSE, 
           AH.ITERATION, 
           AH.APPROVER_NAME, 
           AH.INVOICE_ID, 
           AH.CREATION_DATE AS ACTION_DATE, 
           AH.LAST_UPDATE_DATE
    FROM AP_INV_APRVL_HIST_ALL AH
    WHERE AH.HISTORY_TYPE = 'DOCUMENTAPPROVAL'
      AND AH.APPROVAL_HISTORY_ID = (
          SELECT MAX(AH2.APPROVAL_HISTORY_ID)
          FROM AP_INV_APRVL_HIST_ALL AH2
          WHERE AH2.INVOICE_ID = AH.INVOICE_ID
            AND AH2.HISTORY_TYPE = 'DOCUMENTAPPROVAL'
      )
), 
q2 AS (
    SELECT INVOICE_ID, CREATION_DATE 
    FROM AP_INVOICES_ALL
)
SELECT q2.INVOICE_ID, 
       q2.CREATION_DATE, 
       q1.RESPONSE, 
       q1.ACTION_DATE, 
       q1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS FINAL_APPROVAL_DATE,
       CASE 
           WHEN q1.RESPONSE IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') 
                AND (q1.ACTION_DATE - q2.CREATION_DATE) > 10--x days
           THEN 'Approved but took more than 10 days'
           WHEN q1.RESPONSE NOT IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') 
                AND (SYSDATE - q2.CREATION_DATE) > 10 --x days
           THEN 'Pending for more than 10 days'
           ELSE 'Does not meet criteria'
       END AS STATUS
FROM q1 
JOIN q2 ON q1.INVOICE_ID = q2.INVOICE_ID
WHERE (q1.RESPONSE IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') 
        AND (q1.ACTION_DATE - q2.CREATION_DATE) > 10)
   OR (q1.RESPONSE NOT IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') 
        AND (SYSDATE - q2.CREATION_DATE) > 10)

[User Question]
Current aging summary for vendor type: OTHER (fallback if needed) */

SELECT 
    s.VENDOR_NAME AS "VENDOR_NAME",
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE AS "VENDOR_TYPE",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE > SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "CURRENT",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 30 AND SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_1_30",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 60 AND SYSDATE - 31 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_31_60",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 90 AND SYSDATE - 61 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_61_90",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE - 90 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_90_PLUS"
FROM 
    ap_suppliers s
    JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID
    JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
WHERE 
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE NOT IN ('VENDOR','EMPLOYEE','GOVERNMENT','TAX AUTHORITY')
    AND aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING > 0
    AND AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(
            ai.INVOICE_ID,
            ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
            ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
            ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
        ) = 'APPROVED'
    AND ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'NOT REQUIRED')
    AND ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL
GROUP BY 
    s.VENDOR_NAME, s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE

[User Question]
get net movment of any account in a single period say Mar-08

WITH OpeningBalance AS ( SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, SUM(NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0)) AS opening_balance FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type WHERE led.LEDGER_ID = 1 AND gcc.account_type = 'E' AND gp.PERIOD_NAME = 'Mar-08'  /*Only take opening balance from first period*/ AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY gcc.segment3 ), PeriodMovements AS ( SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0)) AS total_debit, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS total_credit FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type WHERE led.LEDGER_ID = 1 AND gcc.account_type = 'E' AND gp.START_DATE >= (SELECT start_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND gp.END_DATE <= (SELECT end_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY gcc.segment3 ) SELECT pm.account, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(led.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, pm.account) AS account_desc, NVL(ob.opening_balance, 0) AS opening_balance,  /* Opening balance from Mar-08 only */ NVL(pm.total_debit, 0) AS debit,  /* Total period debits from Mar-08 to Mar-08 */ NVL(pm.total_credit, 0) AS credit,  /* Total period credits from Mar-08 to Mar-08 */ NVL(ob.opening_balance, 0) + NVL(pm.total_debit, 0) - NVL(pm.total_credit, 0) AS closing_balance /*Correct closing balance calculation*/ FROM PeriodMovements pm LEFT JOIN OpeningBalance ob ON pm.account = ob.account JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON led.LEDGER_ID = 1 ORDER BY pm.account

[User Question]
List PO numbers and item codes where exchange rate on purchse order is not same as receving.or when receipt cases where there is exchange rate variance*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number,        pda.po_distribution_id,        rct.transaction_id,pha.currency_code,        NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code,        NVL(rct.currency_conversion_rate, 1) AS receipt_exchangerate,        NVL(pha.rate, 1) AS po_exchange_rate,        round(SUM(            CASE                WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' THEN                     rct.quantity * pla.unit_price * NVL(rct.currency_conversion_rate, 1)                WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' THEN                     -1 * rct.quantity * pla.unit_price * NVL(rct.currency_conversion_rate, 1)                ELSE 0            END        ),0) AS exchange_rate_variance FROM rcv_transactions rct      JOIN po_lines_all pla          ON rct.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id      JOIN po_headers_all pha          ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id      JOIN po_line_locations_all plla          ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id      JOIN po_distributions_all pda          ON rct.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id      LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi          ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id         AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rct.transaction_type IN ('RECEIVE', 'RETURN TO VENDOR')   AND rct.currency_conversion_rate <> pha.rate GROUP BY pha.segment1,          pda.po_distribution_id,pha.currency_code,          rct.transaction_id,          NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description),          NVL(rct.currency_conversion_rate, 1),          NVL(pha.rate, 1)

[User Question]
get list of purchases made from a specific vendor or vendor wise not necessarily received

SELECT 
    SUM(pl.unit_price * COALESCE(h.rate, 1) * COALESCE(pd.quantity_ordered, 0)) AS total_purchase,
    CASE 
        WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL THEN m.segment1 
        ELSE NULL 
    END AS item_segment1,
    CASE 
        WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL AND m.description IS NOT NULL THEN m.description 
        ELSE pl.item_description 
    END AS item_description
FROM 
    po_distributions_all pd
JOIN 
    po_lines_all pl ON pl.po_line_id = pd.po_line_id
JOIN 
    po_headers_all h ON pl.po_header_id = h.po_header_id AND h.TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'STANDARD'
JOIN 
    ap_suppliers v ON h.vendor_id = v.vendor_id
LEFT JOIN 
    mtl_system_items_b m 
    ON pd.destination_organization_id = m.organization_id 
   AND pl.item_id = m.inventory_item_id
WHERE

[User Question]
get the list of oustanding invoices as on 31 dec 2007 for vision operations*/

WITH cutoff_param AS (
    /* Define the cutoff date and operating unit name as parameters */
    SELECT 
        TO_DATE('2007-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cutoff_date,
        'Vision Operations' AS operating_unit_name
    FROM dual
),  payments_after_cutoff AS (
    /* Payments made after the cutoff date and restricted to the specified operating unit */
    SELECT
        aip.INVOICE_ID,
        SUM(NVL(aip.AMOUNT, 0)) AS payment_after_cutoff
    FROM
        ap_invoice_payments_all aip
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aip.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
        JOIN cutoff_param c ON 1 = 1
    WHERE
        aip.ACCOUNTING_DATE > c.cutoff_date
        AND UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(c.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        aip.INVOICE_ID
),  prepay_after_cutoff AS (
    /* Prepayment adjustments made after the cutoff date and restricted to the specified operating unit */
    SELECT
        aid.INVOICE_ID,
        SUM(NVL(aid.AMOUNT, 0)) AS prepay_after_cutoff
    FROM
        ap_invoice_distributions_all aid
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aid.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
        JOIN cutoff_param c ON 1 = 1
    WHERE
        aid.LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'PREPAY'
        AND aid.ACCOUNTING_DATE > c.cutoff_date
        AND UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(c.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        aid.INVOICE_ID
),  invoice_balances AS (
    /* Total invoice balances (sum of gross_amount across all payment schedules per invoice),
       restricted to the specified operating unit */
    SELECT
        ai.INVOICE_ID,
        ai.INVOICE_NUM,
        ai.INVOICE_DATE,
        ai.VENDOR_ID,
        SUM(aps.GROSS_AMOUNT) AS GROSS_AMOUNT
    FROM
        ap_invoices_all ai
        JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
        JOIN cutoff_param c ON 1 = 1
    WHERE
        UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(c.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        ai.INVOICE_ID,
        ai.INVOICE_NUM,
        ai.INVOICE_DATE,
        ai.VENDOR_ID
)  SELECT
    /* Final result: unpaid balances per invoice as of the cutoff date */
    s.VENDOR_NAME,
    ib.INVOICE_ID,
    ib.INVOICE_NUM,
    ib.INVOICE_DATE,
    ib.GROSS_AMOUNT,
    NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0) AS payment_after_cutoff,
    NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0) AS prepay_after_cutoff,
    (ib.GROSS_AMOUNT - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0) - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)) AS UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF
FROM
    invoice_balances ib
    JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ib.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID
    LEFT JOIN payments_after_cutoff pac ON ib.INVOICE_ID = pac.INVOICE_ID
    LEFT JOIN prepay_after_cutoff ppc ON ib.INVOICE_ID = ppc.INVOICE_ID
WHERE
    /* Exclude invoices where unpaid balance is fully cleared */
    (ib.GROSS_AMOUNT - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0) - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)) <> 0
ORDER BY
    UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF

[User Question]
Current aging summary for vendor type: TAX AUTHORITY */

SELECT 
    s.VENDOR_NAME AS "VENDOR_NAME",
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE AS "VENDOR_TYPE",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE > SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "CURRENT",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 30 AND SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_1_30",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 60 AND SYSDATE - 31 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_31_60",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 90 AND SYSDATE - 61 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_61_90",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE - 90 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_90_PLUS"
FROM 
    ap_suppliers s
    JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID
    JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
WHERE 
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'TAX AUTHORITY'
    AND aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING > 0
    AND AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(
            ai.INVOICE_ID,
            ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
            ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
            ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
        ) = 'APPROVED'
    AND ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'NOT REQUIRED')
    AND ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL
GROUP BY 
    s.VENDOR_NAME, s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE

[User Question]
to get opening balance at the start period and  period movement  for the period range and closing balance at the end of period across range of period say mar 08 to sep 08

WITH OpeningBalance AS ( SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, SUM(NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0)) AS opening_balance FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type WHERE led.LEDGER_ID = 1 AND gcc.account_type = 'E' AND gp.PERIOD_NAME = 'Mar-08'  /*Only take opening balance from first period*/ AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY gcc.segment3 ), PeriodMovements AS ( SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0)) AS total_debit, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS total_credit FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type WHERE led.LEDGER_ID = 1 AND gcc.account_type = 'E' AND gp.START_DATE >= (SELECT start_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND gp.END_DATE <= (SELECT end_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Sep-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY gcc.segment3 ) SELECT pm.account, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(led.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, pm.account) AS account_desc, NVL(ob.opening_balance, 0) AS opening_balance,  /* Opening balance from Mar-08 only*/ NVL(pm.total_debit, 0) AS debit,  /*Total period debits from Mar-08 to Sep-08*/ NVL(pm.total_credit, 0) AS credit,  /* Total period credits from Mar-08 to Sep-08*/ NVL(ob.opening_balance, 0) + NVL(pm.total_debit, 0) - NVL(pm.total_credit, 0) AS closing_balance  /*Correct closing balance calculation*/ FROM PeriodMovements pm LEFT JOIN OpeningBalance ob ON pm.account = ob.account JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON led.LEDGER_ID = 1 ORDER BY pm.account

[User Question]
Current aging summary for vendor type: TAX AUTHORITY */

SELECT 
    s.VENDOR_NAME AS "VENDOR_NAME",
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE AS "VENDOR_TYPE",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE > SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "CURRENT",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 30 AND SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_1_30",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 60 AND SYSDATE - 31 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_31_60",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 90 AND SYSDATE - 61 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_61_90",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE - 90 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_90_PLUS"
FROM 
    ap_suppliers s
    JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID
    JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
WHERE 
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'TAX AUTHORITY'
    AND aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING > 0
    AND AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(
            ai.INVOICE_ID,
            ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
            ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
            ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
        ) = 'APPROVED'
    AND ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'NOT REQUIRED')
    AND ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL
GROUP BY 
    s.VENDOR_NAME, s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE

[User Question]
POs with Quantity Received but Not Invoiced

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, msi.description AS item_description, msi.primary_uom_code AS base_uom, pla.quantity AS ordered_quantity, SUM(rt.quantity * COALESCE(muc_recv.conversion_rate, 1)) AS received_qty_base_uom, SUM(COALESCE(pda.quantity_billed, 0) * COALESCE(muc_bill.conversion_rate, 1)) AS billed_qty_base_uom FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_distributions_all pda ON pla.po_line_id = pda.po_line_id JOIN rcv_transactions rt ON pda.po_distribution_id = rt.po_distribution_id JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND msi.organization_id = rt.organization_id LEFT JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc_recv ON muc_recv.inventory_item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND muc_recv.uom_code = rt.uom_code AND muc_recv.unit_of_measure = msi.primary_uom_code LEFT JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc_bill ON muc_bill.inventory_item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND muc_bill.uom_code = rt.uom_code AND muc_bill.unit_of_measure = msi.primary_uom_code WHERE rt.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' AND pha.approved_flag = 'Y' GROUP BY pha.segment1, msi.description, msi.primary_uom_code, pla.quantity HAVING SUM(rt.quantity * COALESCE(muc_recv.conversion_rate, 1)) > SUM(COALESCE(pda.quantity_billed, 0) * COALESCE(muc_bill.conversion_rate, 1)) ORDER BY pha.segment1

[User Question]
List of Open Purchase Orders with Total Ordered Amount by Vendor whre po created is more than one year behind

SELECT 
    pha.segment1 AS po_number,
    pha.creation_date AS po_creation_date,
    aps.vendor_name,
    pha.currency_code,
    SUM (pla.quantity * pla.unit_price * COALESCE (pha.rate, 1)) AS total_ordered_amount
FROM 
    po_headers_all pha
    JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id
    JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id
WHERE 
    pha.closed_code = 'OPEN'
    AND pha.approved_flag = 'Y'
    AND pha.creation_date <= SYSDATE - 365
GROUP BY 
    pha.segment1,
    pha.creation_date,
    aps.vendor_name,
    pha.currency_code
ORDER BY 
    pha.segment1

[User Question]
List suppliers and POs with the highest unit price per PO using RANK and CTE.*/

WITH price_rank AS ( SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name, rct.po_unit_price, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY pha.po_header_id ORDER BY rct.po_unit_price DESC) AS price_rank FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id ) SELECT * FROM price_rank WHERE price_rank = 1
